nodes.text: Fema Baab was a female Human Senator who represented the Bajic sector in the Galactic Senate of the Republic. She was extremely loyal to Supreme Chancellor Palpatine near the end of the Clone Wars. In 19 BBY, she wholeheartedly welcomed him back after he was rescued by Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker during the Battle of Coruscant.

Baab attempted to enter into circles of Senators presumed to be against Palpatine's policies during the Clone Wars. However, many Senators presumed Baab—who was outwardly very supportive of the Supreme Chancellor—to be working as his informant. As such, Baab's attempts to infiltrate Senators such as Bail Organa, Padmé Amidala or Mon Mothma were not successful.
In Revenge of the Sith, Fema Baab was played by Olive Levi.
